Summary: I awoke, ufo in front yard, I was shot with a lazer beam through front window, phyiscal effects prove it was no dream.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Peru
There were no other sightings in Peru on or around July 31st 1993
divs: sighting detailsstory is too long. it's very convincing and other family members can verify what happened that night too. i'm thinking about writing a book. it's very interesting and true. but wanted this to go on the record that grissom had alot of ufo activity in 1993\1994 and i haven't seen anything reported on it.
